tacticulous.tira.ai

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.tira.ai.Action

  • public class Action
extends Object
    Stores coordinates for the unit, target tile and movement in addition to the value and type of one specific action.
    Author:
    O

      Basic contructor, unit's coordinates are copied to the action
